actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide increases in certain annuities payable under chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code,

summary.text: Establishes a schedule of increases for each annuity payable from the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund (other than the annuity of a surviving child) having a commencing date prior to October 20, 1969.

titles.title: A bill to provide increases in certain annuities payable under chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code,
